originalTitle: Flights delayed for up to 20 hours as  Kenya airport staff strike for second day
title: Flights delayed for up to 20 hours as  Kenya airport staff strike for second day
content: Airlines are urging travellers to check their flight status before heading to the crowded airport.

originalTitle: Fake funeral suspects allegedly used hearse to smuggle charcoal in Malawi
title: Fake funeral suspects allegedly used hearse to smuggle charcoal in Malawi
content: Officials allege that an empty coffin was placed over concealed bags of charcoal in a hearse.

originalTitle: How the tide turned against the leader of South Africa's second-biggest party
title: How the tide turned against the leader of South Africa's second-biggest party
content: John Steenhuisen will not seek re-election as DA leader, leaving the race wide open for a successor.

originalTitle: Australia refuses to repatriate ISIL relatives from Syrian camp
title: Australia refuses to repatriate ISIL relatives from Syrian camp
content: Australia is refusing to repatriate 34 women and children held in a camp in northern Syria.

title: Gaza aid figures
content: We compare and contrast the US ambassador to the UN’s claim that 4,000 trucks enter Gaza weekly with the actual numbers.

originalTitle: ‘Jordan is next’: West Bank annexation signals ‘silent transfer’
title: ‘Jordan is next’: West Bank annexation signals ‘silent transfer’
content: Jordan warns of war as Israel's 'silent transfer' in the occupied West Bank becomes an operational reality.

originalTitle: Hillary Clinton accuses Trump administration of Epstein files 'cover-up' in BBC interview
title: Hillary Clinton accuses Trump administration of Epstein files 'cover-up' in BBC interview
content: "Get the files out. They are slow-walking it," the former US secretary of state says. The White House says it has done "more for the victims than Democrats ever did".

originalTitle: New nuclear talks between US and Iran begin in Geneva
title: New nuclear talks between US and Iran begin in Geneva
content: The US president says he thinks Iran wants to make a deal, while Tehran believes Washington is moving to a more realistic position.

title: US build-up of warships and fighter jets tracked near Iran
content: BBC Verify has seen US aircraft carrier USS Abraham Lincoln near Iran ahead of talks between the two countries

originalTitle: Williamson returns for World Cup qualifiers
title: Williamson returns for World Cup qualifiers
content: England captain Leah Williamson returns to the squad as they prepare to begin their 2027 Women's World Cup qualifying campaign.

originalTitle: FA Cup heroes Macclesfield make memories to last a lifetime
title: FA Cup heroes Macclesfield make memories to last a lifetime
content: Macclesfield's FA Cup odyssey may have ended against Brentford but they have made memories to last a lifetime, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

originalTitle: 'We really messed up' - does European football need more balance?
title: 'We really messed up' - does European football need more balance?
content: One set of clubs dominate the Champions League, another win their domestic title every year but cannot compete - does European football have a problem?
